description.value:
For the purpose of making project rolls for crafting items (see Downtime Projects), you are considered fluent in all languages. You are considered to have 2 higher Renown when negotiating with an artisan or someone with at least one crafting skill.

Additionally, as a maneuver, you can touch an object and instantly recognize if any illusions or supernatural effects surround it, if it is magical, and know the specifics of what that magic can do.
